announcements.title: New App Version Available
announcements.message: Version 1.1.0 is now available with improved BLE stability and new features. Update recommended.

announcements.title: F1A Firmware Update Available
announcements.message: Firmware v2.5.0 for F1A models includes improved Auto-DT detection and battery life optimization. Update via BLE recommended.

announcements.title: New Feature: GPS Integration
announcements.message: FlexiTimer now supports GPS telemetry! View real-time position, altitude, and speed data on the sensor screen.

announcements.title: Critical Battery Warning
announcements.message: Some F1A devices with firmware v2.3.x may experience battery drain issues. Please update to v2.4.0 or later immediately.

announcements.title: Competition Mode Coming Soon
announcements.message: We're working on a dedicated competition mode with enhanced telemetry logging and flight analysis. Stay tuned!
